price: Hanyuma impanda nivuzwa, nta masano azarangwa hagati yabo kuri uwo munsi, ndetse nta n’uzaba agira icyo abaza undi
arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَلَآ أَنسَابَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ وَلَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nufikha fī al-ṣūri falā ansāba baynahum yawma-idhin walā yatasāalūna
